# Instructions

Global instructions that apply to all Copilot interactions in this workspace.

## Files

- **assistant.instructions.md** â€” Your personal context (name, projects, hashtags, preferences)

## Customization

Edit `assistant.instructions.md` to add:
- Your name and how you want to be addressed
- Your active projects and their hashtags
- Your preferred communication style
- Any context the assistant should always know
